channel.title: time-management on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki
channel.description: Recent content in time-management on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: Interval Time Management Hardware
item.description: Interval Time Management Hardware Mission Empower individuals to make the most of the time we scarcely have left Problem Time-management is very analog, yet very conflictive No dedicated hardware solution to maximize people’s time Lifeops solution based on time doesn’t exist currently Solution HOD-like solution to be subconsciously aware of time Lifeops-based solution to integrate with software Maximize people’s time that we scarcely have left on the face of the earth
item.content:encoded: Interval Time Management Hardware Mission Empower individuals to make the most of the time we scarcely have left Problem Time-management is very analog, yet very conflictive No dedicated hardware solution to maximize people&rsquo;s time Lifeops solution based on time doesn&rsquo;t exist currently Solution HOD-like solution to be subconsciously aware of time Lifeops-based solution to integrate with software Maximize people&rsquo;s time that we scarcely have left on the face of the earth
